attributes.action: allow bona fide western clubs and re-enactors to be allowed to continue to carry replica weapons including sabres and other blades used as part of their costume whilst engaged in re-enactment activity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Violent Crime reduction Act has banned the carrying of replica weapons including swords sabres ect by any person portraying western or historical characters.Except when at a large organised event carring public liability insurance.This is contrary to assurances made by the home office.And has already threatend closure of many western clubs ,parades carnival events and fast draw competitions.The Home office could have created a permit for such groups and it is hoped that they will move to correct this  error and leave the police to concentrate on the criminal use of these weapons
